lead_paragraph: From the detailed accounts of the Mexican revolution we gather that the Pronunciamento pronounces "death to tyrants." The reasons given forth revolt are: First-The utter failure of the Mexican Government to protect northern Mexican States from Indian depredations. Second-The unjust, unequal, prohibitory system of duties which operates most destructively on the interests of the people of the frontier.

headline.main: Further Particulars of the Mexican Revolution by Southern Mail.
